title: Javascript: Understanding the weird parts
description: An advanced JavaScript course for everyone! Scope, closures, prototypes, 'this', build your own framework, and more.

title: TypeScript for Professionals
description: Learn all about the TypeScript type system - taught by a Microsoft MVP. Use TypeScript at your day to day job. Use Types for annotating any JavaScript Object

title: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
description: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!

title: Angular - The Complete Guide
description: Master Angular 13 (formerly 'Angular 2') and build awesome, reactive web apps with the successor of Angular.js

title: NodeJS - The Complete Guide (MVC, REST APIs, GraphQL, Deno)
description: Master Node JS & Deno.js, build REST APIs with Node.js, GraphQL APIs, add Authentication, use MongoDB, SQL & much more!

title: Angular & NodeJS - The MEAN Stack Guide [2022 Edition]
description: Build fullstack React.jsLearn how to connect your Angular Frontend to a NodeJS & Express & MongoDB Backend by building a real Application applications with Node.js, Express.js & MongoDB (MERN) with this project-focused course.
